controllers

Class GestionnaireUnivers

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.GestionnaireUnivers

  • class GestionnaireUnivers
extends Object
    Manages the game's context by retrieving (implicitly) the targeted or default universe (its parameters, and its character CRUD).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private BaseGestionnaireUnivers _gestionnaireUnivers
      The current universe's custom CRUD character and miscellaneous wrapped methods.
      private BaseUnivers _parametresUnivers
      The current universe's context (hard-coded parameters).
      private static GestionnaireUnivers c_instance
      The global and unique instance of this controllers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private GestionnaireUnivers()
      Initialize the universe context manager by reading a univers.txt file in the current working directory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BaseGestionnaireUnivers get_gestionnaireUnivers()
      Retrieves the current universe's custom character CRUD from the instance.
      static BaseUnivers get_universCourrant()
      Retrieves the current universe's context from the instance.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GestionnaireUnivers

        private GestionnaireUnivers()
        Initialize the universe context manager by reading a univers.txt file in the current working directory. It defaults to the UniversMedieval.
